title: Peak radius doesn't bound check analysis region
body:

title: Matplotlib dependency
body: Make it optional or go away or something!

title: mapping file should actually be optional
body: The docs say that the map file is optional, but it's not. What gives, man?

title: Speed up BAM file loading?
body: Any chance you could make file loading go faster?

title: Splitting + and -
body: Nevermind. This is not an issue anymore. Thanks!

title: Reprocessing of false negatives
body: Could we make a script/command that will take genome coordinates of manually curated false negatives and output ER calculation?

title: Binding Site Outside Region?
body:
I just downloaded pique and ran "pique test" and I am confused by some of the results.  In test.peak.tsv I see some peaks where the value for "binds_at" is outside the start-stop range, for example the first result in the file is:
contig  start   stop    binds_at        enrichment_ratio        average_contig_norm     std_contig_norm
PNRC200 49744.0 50430.0 2966    0.785640832525  0.796639235357  0.0     0.796639235357

Is this a bug, or am I misunderstanding?  Thanks!
